articles.content: A near-miss earlier this year between NASA'sTIMED spacecraft and the Russian Cosmos 2221 satellite was even closer than originally thought: The two objects whizzed by each other less than 10 meters a… [+2682 chars]

articles.title: NASA says it expected space station garbage to burn up. The debris smashed into a Florida home instead - CNN
articles.description: A piece of trash intentionally jettisoned from the International Space Station struck a home in Naples, Florida, according to the federal agency.
